producers.name: Kevin Feige
producers.bio: Kevin Feige is an American film producer and president of Marvel Studios. He is known for his work in producing the Marvel Cinematic Universe films. Feige has played a pivotal role in the success of the franchise and has been praised for his ability to oversee the interconnected storytelling.
movies: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings

producers.name: Amy Pascal
producers.bio: Amy Pascal is an American film producer and business executive. She is known for her work in producing various Marvel films in collaboration with Marvel Studios. Pascal has been involved in the development and production of several successful projects in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

producers.name: Victoria Alonso
producers.bio: Victoria Alonso is an Argentine film producer and executive vice president of production at Marvel Studios. She has been involved in the production of numerous Marvel films and has played a crucial role in the expansion of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
movies: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings

producers.name: Louis D'Esposito
producers.bio: Louis D'Esposito is an American film producer and co-president of Marvel Studios. He has been involved in the production of several Marvel films and has contributed to the success of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
movies: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings

producers.bio: Stephen Broussard is an American film producer known for his work in producing Marvel films. He has been involved in the production of several successful projects in the Marvel Cinematic Universe and has contributed to the franchise's ongoing success.

producers.name: Nate Moore
